properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Watch issued January 7 at 3:25AM PST until January 12 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 9 to 13 feet at 12 seconds.
For the Hazardous Seas Watch, very steep and hazardous seas 20
to 25 feet at 17 seconds possible.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM PST Thursday.
For the Hazardous Seas Watch, from late Friday afternoon
through late Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...During the advisory period, small boats and
inexperienced mariners could encounter conditions that could
jeopardize safety. During the watch period, very steep and
hazardous seas could capsize or damage vessels. Bar crossing are
likely to become especially hazardous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that winds and seas will create a
potential hazard to smaller vessels and inexperienced mariners.

A Hazardous Seas Watch is issued when the risk of very steep and
hazardous seas has significantly increased, but the specific
timing and/or location is still uncertain. It is intended to
provide additional lead time for mariners who may wish to consider
altering their plans.

Consider altering your plans to avoid possible hazardous and very
steep sea conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IS CANCELLED... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
